abstract: Yahoo will spin off its 15.4 percent stake in Alibaba into a separate company; move will allow company to avoid taxes on transaction, but will strip it of an $39.5 billion asset that accounts for some 85 percent of its market value; move increases pressure on chief executive Marissa Mayer as she seeks to revamp company's core Internet advertising business.
lead_paragraph: Shedding its 15 percent stake in the Chinese e-commerce site turns the spotlight to Yahoo’s plans to revamp its core Internet advertising business.

byline.original: By VINDU GOEL and MICHAEL. J. DE LA MERCED

snippet: Shedding its 15 percent stake in the Chinese e-commerce site turns the spotlight to Yahoo’s plans to revamp its core Internet advertising business.

headline.main: Yahoo to Spin Off Its Stake in Alibaba
headline.print_headline: Yahoo to Spin Off Its Stake in Alibaba
